summary: work in progress. The goal of this mod is to give all npc more charisma, facelift, change hairs, outfits and various scales.
descriptionHtml:
all skyrim npc improvment, changing their hairs, scale, weight, outfit and faces for better immersion.


Required mod :

ApachiiSkyHair
-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/68476
and his standalone
-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/76734
-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/87237
you can also download his optionnal color patch and his new patch for unp (if you use it).

The mod should work only with these...

Recommended mods (install in that order)
More Freckles by Zhoken http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/515
Xce http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356
Xce eyes darker version http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498
Unp http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709 and his own head texture http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/41468
Unp armors http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305 and http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22033 
you can also give a try to victorias high heel http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272

Installation : use NMM or download it manually and extract to your data folder.
uninstall : with NMM or in data folder delete Charisma.esp, and delete  FaceGenData in textures/actors/character and in meshes/actors/character.

I did it with the creation kit using only skyrim and apachii\'mod, it might be compatible with many other mods, like UFO etc... If you prefer some others npc facelift mod, you can install them after my mod (overwrite).
author: Apitokim
